Summary: Star like object swimming like fish - also baby
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Richmond
There were no other sightings in Richmond on or around July 27th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsStar like object, moved like a fish in a fish tank. Swim a way in fish like motion, then stop. A small object broke off, swam like a baby fish and then rejoined the main star like object. I would guess they were outside the atmosphere, satellite distance. I thought it was most likely sun reflection on the objects, not any lights. Seemed organic. In the end, stopped completely and "pretended" to be a star. I didn't wait out the staring contest. Frustrated no one else saw it. I made multiple calls for people to look, no one answered. Does anyone else ever look up? Weirded me out.
